refnamediv.refpurpose: Handle of the object whose callback is executing.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: gcbo is a Scilab variable automatically created each time a callback in executed. This variable is initialised using getcallbackobject.
gcbo does not exists in Scilab environment if no callback is currently executed.
You can use gcbo in callback functions particularly if you write a single callback function for multiple objects, it helps you to know which object received a user action.
